__e: Jocelyn: And then we see you with your kids and you're so... together.
- You want to look your children in the face and tell them you did nothing? !
And to have more time to be with your children and wives
So your babies are brother and sister?
- They're not your sons, they're ours.
At least your children are safe.
It's wonderful to meet you. I have heard so much about you and the kids.
Have you none of you ever thought of having a school for your children?
- But your kids are gone, aren't they?
Okay, on your mark, get set...
All command posts, stand by to fire.
On your mark, get set, go!
Everybody stay in your seats and no one will get hurt!
Get back to your posts! That's an order!
All right, ladies, take your seats, we'll be out of here.
You're not sitting in your regular seats, so this will be a mess.
And that was the last time you spoke to me, other than to say "places, please,"
I know, and your parents didn't fare any better.
I know you guys didn't ask to be in this situation, And i am so sorry that your parents aren't here, But i am.
Well, how could he blame you for your parents' death?
I know what you and your friends are doing, and I want to be a part of it.
I heard about your friends and
Like, when you're alone with your mom, you can take it. But when you're with your friends and she starts talking, "Well, we got here at 5:00."
Your friends found it, but they didn't have all of it.
* What about you and the rest of your friends?
- Do you all have your friends?
You have goodness in you - I can see it in your eyes... and you have the same eyes as her.
It has your eyes and your mouth.
Come on. There was a guy drilling a hole in my head With six of you watching.
To all of you, she had everything and I had nothing.
Where's that fire I saw in your eyes the night they killed your friend?
Lucas is the one who was hurt by your men and he lost his memory because of it.
Erm, a few months ago, I spent a night in the company of one of your boys and...
For that, one of your men was killed.
You have positioned your men well.
No, your man's at work in there.
Did your men go to the right place?
Good. You have your man do it, I'll have mine.
And with your men, more so.
Why aren't y'all men at work?
